EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for reaching out to YETI!
I see that you are interested in placing a bulk order. Weâ€™ve partnered with a company called Premco who is our representative for the Advertising Specialty Industry. Premco will be more than happy to work with you to get an order placed.

Let me know if you have any questions and have a great day!
Thanks,
{!User.CommunityNickname} Business Development Team YETI 512.402.5895 corporatesales@yeti.com yeti.com
